data.name: Riverbed APM User Conference Vol. 2
data.location: Microsoft Technology Centers, 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston, VA
data.description: Our second peer-driven technical user conference event for the SteelCentral AppInternals and Aternity community will be held on August 29-30 in Washington, DC. Save the date!
